design_h1: Design that inspires a better way to work.
design_p: We've developed a series of purpose-built rooms that offer companies looking for change an affordable, sustainable, and flexible alternative to fixed construction and traditional office design.
companies_h2: The world's leading brands choose ROOM.
plus_h2: Our simple and seamless modular products allow teams to shape and then reshape their work environment with ease.
card_1_p: At a fraction of the cost of traditional construction, our pre-fab solutions create additional space for focused work and collaboration without constant noise, debris and distraction.
card_2_p: Thoughtful design ensures simple installation in a few hours or less. And, because our products are safety ensured, you'll never have to spend time or money chasing after permits, contractors, and more.
card_3_p: Unlike traditional construction, our purpose-built products were designed to adapt with your workspace and can easily be positioned in various places throughout your office, or to an entirely new location.
review_1_h3: “We can now have meetings in peace.”
review_2_h3: “Amazing private space to get work done.”
text_2_p: We take a human approach to a business-to-business industry, breaking the boundaries between corporate and personal, and rethinking every step of the user experience along the way.
text_2_h3: We make work, work for you.
description_1_p: We make extra room in the budget without compromising quality by selling direct. No middle man, and no additional construction required.
description_2_p: We’re not just building another room with four walls, we’re building a more productive workspace. We design with you in mind, looking at every detail as an opportunity to enable a better working environment for everyone.
description_3_p: From design to delivery, we strive to lessen our impact on the environment. Our products are engineered with recycled materials and replace multiple cycles of construction, minimizing noise and our footprint.
footer_block_mailing_1: Be the first to hear everything about ROOM.
footer_block_mailing_2: Yes. I would like to receive marketing communications from ROOM about product updates and special offers. Please refer to ROOM’s Privacy Policy for more information about how we process your data (including how to unsubscribe).
